main event: An observer reported seeing a bright kite-like object in the sky for about 30 minutes on June 17, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared brighter than a star and had a pulsating glow., The object exhibited a rocking motion., There was no physical evidence recorded for the observation., The observer compared the object's brightness to that of a dime., The report concluded that the data was insufficient for evaluation.
witness description: the observer reported seeing the object alone
